description:
tox -e py34 command show warning:

../openstack/nova/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.py:156: OsloDBDeprecationWarning: EngineFacade is deprecated; please use oslo.db.sqlalchemy.enginefacade
retry_interval=conf_group.retry_interval)
title: OsloDBDeprecationWarning: EngineFacade is deprecated

comments.content:

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/221310
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=80d7448e80ae4b9883ef0b9d24be5dbd09ee664c
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 80d7448e80ae4b9883ef0b9d24be5dbd09ee664c
Author: Sergey Nikitin <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Nov 5 21:05:43 2015 +0300

    Use EngineFacade from oslo_db.enginefacade
    
    'get_session' and 'get_api_session' methods are still
    needed for backward compatibility.
    
    Implements: blueprint new-oslodb-enginefacade
    
    Closes-Bug: #1502104
    
    Co-Authored-By: Pavel Kholkin <email address hidden>
    
    Change-Id: I8ceb9f939470f744f0d616d7db065a4d5d80202b

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b1 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
